thread.title: Soccabet, Simply The Best Betting Company In Ghana

title: Soccabet, Simply The Best Betting Company In Ghana
text:
18:40 CET Soccabet, Simply The Best Betting Company In Ghana By Daily Guide 
SOCCABET, a recently launched online betting company is spreading all around Ghana. With a lot of benefits ahead the other existing companies, Soccabet is leading in its market in just few months after establishment. 'We guarantee the highest odds, up to 100% BONUS system, best online products, instant payment, weekly prizes and best customer support' noted Mr. Gungoren Arslan, Chief Executive Officer of Soccabet. 'For all these reasons, we are already making inroads in the betting industry, though we are just six months in Ghana. Soccabet became leaders as a focused online betting business.' he added. Noticing that Soccabet opened within 6 months 50 shops around Accra and planning for additional 50 regional shops in the near future. Accordingly, they employed up to 1000 people and hoping to create additional 1000 vacancies the soonest possible. Soccabet head office is located in OSU, Oxford Street, Markcofie building, opposite papaya. 
For more information visit: www.soccabet.com Sports News Follow Us Problems rotate their hosts. Today, it´s Ali, tomorrow it´s Seidu. Your turn will come. By: Adwoa Ayamba
